attributes.action: create a zero tolerance police system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Zero Tolerance Policing, pioneered by the NYPD saw crime fall by 39% and murder by 49%. 
When trialled by a county in the UK for three months, crime fell by 22%

Zero Tolerance Policing has been taken up by more forces in the USA, and I believe we should follow suit.
In London, 81% of residents of King's Cross said they feel safer thanks to the Metropolitan Police's "Operation Zero Tolerance" which targeted petty crime around King's Cross station. 

The Police do an amazing job and have to put up with a lot of abuse, I believe we should support this approach being taken up Nationwide and stop the wave of anti-police mindset spreading rapidly across the country. 

Statistics Source is from the BBC
